description:
Crystal specializes in Autism Spectrum Disorders and related developmental delays, including ADHD, Dyslexia, Dyspraxia, Auditory Processing, Reading, Writing and Spelling Difficulties. A variety of evidence based therapies and ancillary services are provided:

* Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA)
* Speech and Language
* Occupational Therapy
* Physical Therapy
* Music and Art
* Gymnastics
* Social Groups
* Academic Tutoring

The team is certified in Behavior, ESE, Occupational, Speech and Language, Prompt, INPP (Neurodevelopment), Fast ForWord, Handwriting without Tears, IL (Integrated Listening System) and IM (Interactive Metronome).
name: CRYSTAL PREMIUM THERAPY CENTER AND SCHOOL
